title: mAnini vAmata
sahitya:
mAnini vamata manasi karutarule


anupallavi

  sUnagandha lasitE sasukhamiha vasa shayanE


caraNam 1    mati vadanE tava kOpamitu mAmanu paramendinu 
satatam tvayidhrita mati jnyAn sarasa shIlE kAntE 
ati madhura vacanattinAl AdhibhAram mama tIrttu 
vitara madhura madhuram cati veDinjyennODadhunA
    caraNam 2    mudita sArasanAbhE hA mOdamODu vaikIDAte 
madana kELi mayi kalaya maratakAbha kAntE kOmaLa radana 
kAnti parihasita ramya kanda sumE mAmanu
